file_content.text: Here is the fraud. Useless weakling Mako pretends is bounty hunter.
That gives you three seconds to get out of my way.
I'm going to count to three.
Think you scare me? You are nothing!
Hello yourself. How are you doing on this fine day?
So nice to meet you.
Don't be high-and-mighty! Not with me!
I've got no idea who you are or why I should care.
Am I supposed to know you?
That because you're stupid.
Tarro Blood doesn't want you in Great Hunt. Smart person would take the hint. You're not smart.
One....
I'm going to start counting.
Want to tell me where your pal Tarro is?
He and I have catching up to do.
I'm just trying to get sponsored like everyone else.
No reason to get crazy.
Hold on, let me get my blaster out.
You really want to die?
I hear all about how your weak master is butchered! Now you have no team, no support.
Tarro Blood tells me I take you out, he makes sure I get in Great Hunt.
Even if I have to let Blood win, just being in Great Hunt is big honor.
Two....
Still counting.
What color is Rodian blood? I'm guessing it's unpleasant.
You really want this fight?
You're going to join the Great Hunt to throw it?
That's a terrible plan.
This one time I'll kill for free.
Fine, you die.
I think after I go in Great Hunt, I come back and have statue made of me stepping on your head.
Three!
I warned you. [Attack]
Crazy suicidal Rodians.
Not likely. [Attack]
The sponsorship is mine!
I suggest you let me walk away.
I'm leaving.
You can't go into Great Hunt if you're dead!
I'm going to the Great Hunt, end of story.
That sponsorship is mine.
Not if you're dead!
Think that impresses Nem'ro? Anybody can kill Evocii. Nem'ro only impressed that you're not dead already.
